readable.title: 2497420371_74788d7ba1
readable.content: A man fiddles with a shopping bag outside near a shopping cart . A man gathers his belongings by the side of a building . A man in a black cap is opening a bag beside a bicycle and a shopping cart . A man looks in a bag near some grocery carts and a bike . A man outside at a red brick building with a grocery cart , a bike , and miscellaneous .
